TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的配置元素。

span.span: Represents a configuration element within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，用于表示配置文件 （如 Web.config) 中的 XML 元素。The is an abstract class that is used to represent an XML element in a configuration file (such as Web.config). 配置文件中的元素可以包含零行、 一行或更多的子元素。An element in a configuration file can contain zero, one, or more child elements. 因为类定义为抽象，不能创建它的一个实例。Because the class is defined as abstract, you cannot create an instance of it. 只能从它派生的类。You can only derive classes from it. .NET Framework 包括派生的类类以表示标准的 XML 配置元素，如。The .NET Framework includes classes that derive from the class in order to represent standard XML configuration elements, such as . 您还可以扩展类来访问自定义配置元素和部分。You can also extend the class to access custom configuration elements and sections. 包含在本主题后面的示例演示如何通过使用自定义派生的类访问自定义配置元素和部分。The example included later in this topic shows how to access custom configuration elements and sections by using custom classes that derive from . 此外可以如扩展标准配置类型， ， ，和。You can also extend the standard configuration types such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅这些类的文档。For more information, see the documentation for those classes. 有关如何访问配置文件中的信息的详细信息，请参阅类和类。For more information about how to access information in configuration files, see the class and the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个自定义作为自定义部分中的各个元素和自定义部分中的元素集合。The following code example shows how to implement a custom both as an individual element in a custom section and as a collection of elements in a custom section. 该示例包含以下文件：The example consists of the following files: - 一个包含名为的自定义部分的 app.config 文件`MyUrls`。An app.config file that contains a custom section that is named `MyUrls`. 本部分包含 （不包含任何其他元素） 的简单元素和元素的集合。This section contains a simple element (it does not contain any other elements) and a collection of elements. 名为的简单元素`simple`，并命名为集合`urls`。The simple element is named `simple` and the collection is named `urls`. - 控制台应用程序。A console application. 应用程序读取 app.config 文件的内容，并将信息写入到控制台。The application reads the contents of the app.config file and writes the information to the console. 它使用派生的类， ，和。It uses classes that derive from , , and . - 名为的类`UrlsSection`派生类。A class named `UrlsSection` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`MyUrls`配置文件中的部分。This class is used to access the `MyUrls` section in the configuration file. - 名为的类`UrlsCollection`派生类。A class named `UrlsCollection` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`urls`配置文件中的集合。This class is used to access the `urls` collection in the configuration file. - 名为的类`UrlConfigElement`派生类。A class named `UrlConfigElement` that derives from the class. 使用此类访问`simple`元素和的成员`urls`配置文件中的集合。This class is used to access the `simple` element and the members of the `urls` collection in the configuration file. 若要运行该示例，请执行以下步骤：To run the example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建一个解决方案，具有一个控制台应用程序项目和一个类库项目名为`ConfigurationElement`。Create a solution that has a console application project and a class library project that is named `ConfigurationElement`. 2. 将三个类文件放在类库项目中并将其他文件放入控制台库项目。Put the three class files in the class library project and put the other files in the console library project. 3. 在这两个项目设置的引用`System.Configuration`。In both projects set a reference to `System.Configuration`. 4. 在控制台应用程序项目设置对类库项目的项目引用。In the console application project set a project reference to the class library project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#151)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#151)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomSection.cs#71)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomSection.vb#71)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElementCollection.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElementCollection.vb#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#31)]

span.para: 每个对象创建的内部的集合代表元素特性或子元素的集合的对象。包含非自定义的信息和功能对象提供的属性。可以使用编程方式或声明性的 （特性化） 编码模型来创建自定义配置元素： 的编程模型要求为每个元素属性，创建要获取或设置其值并将其添加到内部属性的属性包的基础基类。有关如何使用此模型的示例，请参阅类。 -更简单的声明性模型，也称为特性化的模型，允许您通过使用的属性定义元素属性和然后对它修饰的属性。这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关的属性类型及其默认值。使用此信息，通过反射，获取 ASP.NET 配置系统为您创建元素属性的对象，并执行所需的初始化。本主题后面所示的示例演示如何使用此模型。

Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements. Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property. You can use either a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element: - The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute, you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class. For an example of how to use this model, see the class. - The simpler declarative model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and then decorate it with attributes. These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization. The example shown later in this topic shows how to use this model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象提供所需的上下文对象，从而使决策基于计算位置。A object provides the context necessary for a object to make decisions based upon where it is being evaluated. 对象提供了相关的配置元素的环境详细信息。The object provides environment details related to an element of the configuration. 例如，可以使用属性来确定是否已在 Machine.config 中设置或可以确定哪些层次结构元素使用属于属性。For example, you can use the property to determine whether a was set in Machine.config, or you can determine which hierarchy a element belongs to by using the property.

exception.span: 当前元素未关联上下文。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否这对象将写入到配置文件时调用方法。The method determines whether this object will be written to the configuration file when the method is called. 如果返回的值为 `false`，则表明配置文件表示该元素的当前状态。If the return value is `false`, it is assumed that the configuration file represents the current state of the element. 默认情况下将返回`true`通过索引器设置到此属性后对象。By default, returns `true` after a property is set through the indexer to this object. 重写方法以提供自定义此状态指示元素。Override the method to provide custom indication of the state of this element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何扩展。The following example shows how to extend . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#35)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#35)] 在前面的示例所示的方法被调用时修改的配置元素，如以下示例所示。The method shown in the previous example is called when a configuration element is modified, as in the following example. summary.span: 获取被锁定的特性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of locked attributes.

value.span: 该元素被锁定的特性（属性）的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您可以同时锁定所有属性，指定一个除外。The property allows you to lock all the attributes at once, with the exception of the one you specify. 若要执行此操作，应使用方法，如示例部分中所述。To do that, you use the method, as explained in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 属性，可防止子元素向其应用此规则从正在修改的配置元素。The property allows you to prevent the child configuration elements of the element to which you apply the rule from being modified. 使用本身和及其子元素，如果你想要设置常规属性锁定父元素上。Use the property if you want to put a general lock on the parent element itself and its child elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#9)]

span.para: 如果您使用和属性相同时，限制性最强的规则适用。
If you use the and properties at the same time, the most restrictive rule applies.
